Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior, elaborated with one line of 'pie-crust' decoration, is covered with a self slip and faint traces of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394341) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394341)
